thread.title: Man who led police on 30-mile, 46-minute chase facing criminal charges
thread.title_full: Man who led police on 30-mile, 46-minute chase facing criminal charges

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Man who led police on 30-mile, 46-minute chase facing criminal charges
text: Orlando was contacted by phone through Lapeer County 911 during the pursuit, but police say he refused to stop while claiming intentions of harming himself. Speed fluctuated above and below speed limits during the chase.
